page.title: 06BIOGRAPHY-MICHAEL DOLENZ
page.content: Michael (Micky) Dolenz moved into Winthorpe House in 1985,with English - born wife,Trina,and their three children.Born in California,U.S.A., he followed his father into the film industry at the age of 10 years.During the 1960's he was a member of the "Monkees"group which made records and several series of light{entertainment} television programmes. He is now a producer and director of television programmes and films.In 1983,he directed "Bugsy Malone",a stage show with a cast of children. Having visited most parts of the world during his career ,he decided to stay in England after working here for a while.He prefers it to America because of superior standards of{education}and a safer{society. His principal interest is horses and he intends to take up polo.
